#include <stdio.h>
#include <stdlib.h>
int Partition(int arr[],int low,int up)
{
    int temp,i,j;
    long long int pivot;
    i=low+1;
    j=up;
    pivot=arr[low];
    while(i<=j)
    {
        while((arr[i]<pivot)&&(i<up))
        {
            i++;
        }
        while(arr[j]>pivot)
        {
            j--;
        }
        if(i<j)
        {
            temp=arr[i];
            arr[i]=arr[j];
            arr[j]=temp;
            i++;
            j--;
        }
        else
        {
            i++;
        }
    }
    arr[low]=arr[j];
    arr[j]=pivot;
    return j;
}
void Quick(int arr[],int low,int up)
{
    int pivloc;
    if(low>=up)
    {
       return;
    }
    pivloc=Partition(arr,low,up);
    Quick(arr,low,pivloc-1);
    Quick(arr,pivloc+1,up);
}
int main(void) {
int n=1,i,j,k,count,p;
while(1)
{
	int b[2001]={0};
	
	count=0;
	scanf("%d",&n);
    if(n==0)
    	break;
	for(i=0;i<n;i++)
	{
		scanf("%d",&b[i]);
	}
	Quick(b,0,(n-1));
	for(i=0;i<n;i++)
	{
		for(j=i+1;j<n-1;j++)
		{
			p=b[j]+b[i];
			for(k=j+1;k<n;k++)
			{
				if(p<b[k])
					count++;
			}
		}
	}
	printf("%d\n",count);
	}
return 0;
}
